title: Our Services
description: 4ED Group begun as a small cement retail outlet with a single location and by mid-2013, was granted full accredited distributorship status by the Heidelberg Group (the second largest cement manufacturer in the world, based in Germany) to distribute cement nationwide and beyond. This accomplishment allowed 4ED Group to develop into the largest sole distributor of Cement in Ghana.
